\[
\rho\frac{D\underline{u}}{Dt}=-\underline{\nabla}p+\mu\Delta\underline{u}-\dfrac{1}{3}\mu\underline{\nabla}\cdot\left(\underline{\nabla}\cdot\underline{u}\right)+\rho\underline{g}
\]
